00069     // This enum should actually be named simply "OpenMethod" (sans-Dz),
00070     // but because the current public build of Bryce 5.5(c) included the
00071     // wrapper header which then used the Dz name, and we've since
00072     // changed it for consistency with the rest of the SDK, we do this - REW
00073     enum    DzOpenMethod { DefaultMethod = 0, OpenNew, MergeFile };
00074     typedef DzOpenMethod OpenMethod;
00075 
00076     enum    IncludeFlags { DzObjectsOnly = 0x00000000, DzIncludeLightsFlag = 0x00000001,
00077                 DzIncludeCamerasFlag = 0x00000002, DzIncludeNonShadowersFlag = 0x00000004,
00078                 DzIncludeNonVisibleFlag = 0x00000008, DzIncludeAllFlag = 0x000000ff };
